title: God’s Word > My Words
verse_text: Your word is a lamp to my feet, a light on my path.
insight: Our words are temporary. God’s Word is eternal.
When life feels dark, Scripture is the flashlight that never dies.
one_minute_win: Read one verse out loud today and carry it with you.
related_devotionals: Isaiah 55:11 Devotional - God’s Word Will Not Return Empty
Matthew 4:4 Devotional - Man Shall Not Live on Bread Alone
